definitions.definition: Which preserves the order of morphism composition : formally, which associates each morphism f : X → Y {\displaystyle f:X\to Y} to a morphism F ( f ) : F ( X ) → F ( Y ) {\displaystyle F(f):F(X)\to F(Y)} .

main_definition: ( category theory , of a functor ) Which preserves the order of morphism composition : formally, which associates each morphism f : X → Y {\displaystyle f:X\to Y} to a morphism F ( f ) : F ( X ) → F ( Y ) {\displaystyle F(f):F(X)\to F(Y)} .
secondary_definitions: ( object-oriented programming ) Using or relating to covariance .
